import React from 'react' import { Card,CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './tour-card.css'; const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,city,photo,price,avgRating,reviews}=tour return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}({reviews.lenght})
{title}
${price}/per person
Book now
) } export default TourCard
